document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of deep-water Calcigorgia gorgonians (Anthozoa: Octocorallia) from the Kurile Islands, Sea of Okhotsk, with a review of distinctive characters of the known species of the genus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of deep-water Calcigorgia gorgonians (Anthozoa: Octocorallia) from the Kurile Islands, Sea of Okhotsk, with a review of distinctive characters of the known species of the genus

subSubSection.paragraph: Polyps remote from each other, arranged irregularly on the surface of the branch, in alcohol preserved material 5–10 mm high and 4 mm wide. Polyp body wall cylindrical in shape and with smooth surface. Sclerites are unordered in the tentacles, the body wall and the coenenchyme.

caption.paragraph:
Table 1. Distinctive characters of species in the genus
Calcigorgia Broch, 1935
. The greatest length for the different types of sclerites is provided in parentheses.

subSubSection.paragraph: Polyp tentacles contain: (1) warty clubs, up to 0.28 mm long; (2) club-like spindles, up to 0.3 mm long; and (3) spindles up to 0.4 mm long. The polyp body wall contains (1) warty clubs, up to 0.28 mm long; (2) club-like spindles, up to 0.4 mm long; (3) capstans and ovals, up to 0.15 mm long; and (4) spindles up to 0.4 mm long. The outer layer of coenenchyme densely filled with capstans and ovals, up to 0.15 mm long, and may contain warty spindles up to 0.19 mm long.
The specific epithet is for Simushir Island (Kurile Islands, Sea of Okhotsk), nearest to the locality where the holotype was found.

materialsCitation.location: expedition of PFRC and ZIN RAS on RV “ Tikhookeansky ”, east of Simushir Is.
materialsCitation.paragraph: KURILE ISLANDS : 120 × 84 mm, expedition of PFRC and ZIN RAS on RV “Tikhookeansky”, east of Simushir Is. , 46°46′41″ N, 151°55′23″ E, 200 m , dredged , 16 Aug. 1987 , S . Grebelnyi leg. ( MIMB 20721 ).

materialsCitation.location: expedition of PFRC and ZIN RAS on RV " Tikhookeansky "
materialsCitation.paragraph: KURILE ISLANDS : 1 specimen , 70 × 22 mm, expedition of PFRC and ZIN RAS on RV “Tikhookeansky” , Iturup Is ., V. Lukin coll., 45°09′40″ N , 148°52′21″ E , 400 m , dredged , 29 Sep. 1987 ( MIMB 20703 ).

subSubSection.paragraph: three specimens were collected near Kurile Islands and stored in MIMB
